devdoc.details: Naming this factory contract as DocumentStoreCreator so that typechain can name the factory of this contract as DocumentStoreCreatorFactory and it does not collide with the automatically generated DocumentStoreFactory automatically generated by typechain

params.creator: The address of the creator of the new DocumentCertNFT instance
params.instance: The address of the newly deployed DocumentCertNFT instance

params.creator: The address of the creator of the new DocumentStore instance
params.instance: The address of the newly deployed DocumentStore instance

params.domainName: The domain name of the new DocumentStore instance
params.name: The name of the new DocumentStore instance
params.nftName: The name of the new NFT instance
params.nftSymbol: The symbol of the new NFT instance

returns._0: The address of the newly deployed DocumentStore instance

devdoc.title: DocumentStoreCreator

DocumentCertNFTDeployed(address,address).notice: Emitted when a new DocumentCertNFT instance is deployed

DocumentStoreDeployed(address,address).notice: Emitted when a new DocumentStore instance is deployed

deploy(string,string,string,string).notice: Deploys a new DocumentStore instance with the given name
